channel.title: Mass Effect: The Cycle of Extinction
channel.description:
I thought that I could share a fanmade Mass Effect video that I finished a couple of days ago. I recorded everything except the music by myself. Mostly to get my own touch to the video rather than extracting parts from trailers. The goal with this video was to create a desperate feeling by summarizing the main plot of the series. Suggestions, thoughts and comments are always welcome!
[url='https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=7Ld-ytlL1VQ']Mass Effect: The Cycle of Extinction[/url]
[b]Also, if anyone of you have made something related to the Mass Effect series why not link it here?[/b]

item.title: Mass Effect: The Cycle of Extinction
item.dc:creator: Skilgannon
item.description:
That was actually pretty damned good. Son, I am impress.

Also, your Afterlife video captures what is possibly one of the most memorable scenes of that game (and maybe of modern gaming) perfectly. Keep it up.

Read full topic

item.title: Mass Effect: The Cycle of Extinction
item.dc:creator: Cellander
item.description:
Yea, I’ve been thinking on that as well, I’ll definately make another video. My video is a response to a video covering the things you mentioned. However he only used voice samples from Sovereign.

Read full topic
item.source: Mass Effect: The Cycle of Extinction

item.title: Mass Effect: The Cycle of Extinction
item.dc:creator: Harun
item.description:
it’ awesome :o

Could you make a vid concentrating on the reaper? Like taking stuff from both ME parts. I found Sovoreign, his voice and his(its?) way of talking quite uhhm yeah, awesome.
It would be very cool to make a vid with maybe some Sovoreign and harbinger quotes to point out how different the reaper are.(For example: I am beyond your comprehension. I am Sovoreign. <-- That gave me a chill down my spine)
I hope my intention is getting clear here…

Anyway, keep it up, whatever you plan

Read full topic

Thanks!

the ending was fabulous
